name: Bot Stove Gold
description:
Help the stove robot to collect all the gold that is scattered throughout the dungeon floors. Our hero's technology is obsolete, with every step it expends energy and it's fire goes out, becoming increasingly difficult to see. To avoid the worst it is also necessary to collect the flames that are scattered around the scene.

WASD keys and Arrows keys to move.

Built on the last days of the 32-bit Jam. The music themes are modified versions of Synth Menu (by iamoneabe) CC-BY-SA 4.0 and Flies By The Fire (by Tavalus) CC-BY 4.0.
